text: Kraussaria is a genus of grasshoppers in the subfamily Cyrtacanthacridinae with species found in Africa.Uvarov. 1923. Ann. Mag. nat. Hist. 9 11:144. == Species == The following species are recognised in the genus Kraussaria: * Kraussaria angulifera (Krauss, 1877) * Kraussaria corallinipes (Karsch, 1896) * Kraussaria deckeni Kevan, 1955 * Kraussaria dius (Karsch, 1896) * Kraussaria prasina (Walker, 1870) == References == Category:Acrididae
title: Kraussaria
